# Presentation

::: {#center}
From international Academia to Private industry in Denmark, __data enthusiast scientist__ with 12 yrs of experience specializing in statistical modelling and spatial analysis. __Programming in R__ using large spatio-temporal and environmental datasets, I bring a strong statistical background and scientific rigour. I am eager to apply my analytical expertise and problem-solving skills to drive innovation and business impact in the private sector. 

+ __Strengths__: Structured (daily markdown reports), Writing & Reporting (secured a €290,000 grant).
+ __Work Ethics__: Deliver on time (task list fan!), Detail oriented & Meticulous (consistent double-checking). 
+ __Communication__: Attended 13  conferences (3 awards), Translated science to non-specialists (3MT winner).
+ __Technical Skills__: Statistical Modelling (proficient in R for 12 yrs), Data Visualization (Organized  workshops).  
+ __Ambition__: Transition from Academia to the Industry to focus fully on data analysis while seeking an opportunity to contribute to a real-world impact in the Private sector.
